title: Verify the Chromecast Icon Appears
custom_preconds:
Given the same Wi-fi network is used by the Chromecast receiver and the iPad.
AND the HBO NOW app for iOS has been loaded on the iPad
custom_steps:
When the user successfully logs into HBO NOW 
And visually verifies the location of the Casting icon.
custom_expected:
THEN the Chromecast icon will appear in between the HBO NOW Logo and the Search icon
AND it will be displayed in white for inactive.

title: Chromecast Icon Displays Available Network Sessions When Tapped
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has HBO NOW app for iOS installed on the iPad
AND the iPAD is on the same Wi-fi network as the Chromecast device
AND multiple network sessions are available on the Chromecast
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps the enabled Cast icon on the iPad
custom_expected: THEN the iPad will display all available Chromecast network sessions

title: Cast Mini Controller Contains Disconnect Option
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has HBONOW app installed on iPad
AND the iPad is on the same Wi-fi network as the Chromecast device
AND the user tapped the Chromecast icon to an Active state
AND the user has selected an available cast
custom_steps: WHEN the Disconnect option has been tapped by the user
custom_expected:
THEN the iPad is no longer casting the asset
AND the icon has returned to inactive mode

title: Backgrounding application during playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has the HBO NOW app on the iPad, 
AND the iPad is on the same Wi-fi network as the Chromecast,
AND the user has started playing an asset on Chromecast
custom_steps:
WHEN the user is casting media and backgrounds the HBO NOW app
AND brings the application back to the foreground
custom_expected: THEN the media playback continues casting uninterrupted
